organic.organic module#

A module to reconstruct images from optical interferometry data using Generative Adversarial Networks. This is the core module of ORGANIC.

class organic.organic.Data(dir, file)#

Bases: object

get_bootstrap()#
get_data()#
read_data()#
class organic.organic.GAN(gen='', dis='', npix=128, train_disc=False, noiselength=100, adam_lr=0.0001, adam_beta1=0.91, reset_opt=True, amsgrad=True, tf_verbose=False)#

Bases: object

The GAN class to train and use it The GAN is made from a generator and a discriminator

create_discriminator(ReLU=0.25, dropout=0.5)#
create_gan(train_disc=False, train_gen=True, reinit=True)#
create_generator(ReLU=0.25)#
filter_pca_cluster(cube, ncluster=1)#

Method to filter the worst (in terms of total loss) ncluster clusters in PCA-projected space. :param Cube cube: The post_organic Cube object containing the generated images.

get_image(noise)#
static get_optimizer(lr, beta1, beta2=0.999, epsilon=1e-07, amsgrad=False)#
get_random_image()#
give_imgrec_diagnostics(hist, chi2, discloss, r, epochs, mu)#
image_reconstruction(data_files, sparco, data_dir='./', mu=1, epochs=50, nrestart=50, reinit_gen=False, boot=False, nboot=100, ps=0.6, use_low_cp_approx=False, grid=False, diagnostics=False, name='')#
image_to_fits(image, ftot, fdata, frgl, name='image.fits')#
img_rec(reinit_gen=False)#
plot_gan_evolution(dis_fake_loss, dis_real_loss, gen_loss, dis_fake_accuracy, gen_accuracy)#

plotGanEvolution

parameters:

epoch: array containing the epochs to be plotted on the x-newaxis discrFakeLoss: cost values for the discriminators response to fake(generated) image data discrRealLoss: cost values for the discriminators response to real(model) image data genLoss: cost values for the generator discrFakeAccuracy: accuracy values for the discriminators response to fake(generated) image data discrRealAccuracy: accuracy values for the discriminators response to real(model) image data genAccuracy: accuracy values for the generator

effect:

Plots the cost and accuracy terms as a function of epoch and stores the resulting plots

plot_generated_images(epoch, examples=36, dim=(6, 6), figsize=(15, 9))#
parameters:

epoch: the epoch at which th plots are made, used for naming the image generator: the generator neural network during the given epochs examples: the number of examples to be displayed in the plot

effect:

saves images contain a number of random example images created by the generator

plot_image(img, name='image.png', chi2_label='')#
plot_loss_evol(chi2, dis_loss)#
read_models()#

Loading the dictionnary from the generator and discriminator pathes

run_grid(reinit_gen=False)#
save_cube(cube, losses, name='cube.fits')#
save_image_from_noise(noise, name='image.png')#
save_images(image, losses)#
save_model(model_name)#

saveModel

parameters:

Modelname: name to be used for storing the networks of this run

effect:

saves the keras models (neural networks) in their current state

save_random_image(name='random_image.png')#
set_dataloss()#

class organic.organic.InputImages(dir, file, imagesize=128, loadfromCube=True, featurewise_center=False, samplewise_center=False, featurewise_std_normalization=False, samplewise_std_normalization=False, zca_whitening=False, zca_epsilon=1e-06, rotation_range=180, width_shift_range=0, height_shift_range=0, shear_range=0.0, zoom_range=[0.9, 1.1], channel_shift_range=0.0, fill_mode='nearest', cval=-1.0, horizontal_flip=True, vertical_flip=True, rescale=None, preprocessing_function=None, data_format=None, validation_split=0.0)#

Bases: object

a class to get format the images the way keras can augment them

load()#
load_data()#
load_data_from_cube()#

load_data_fromCube

parameters:

dir: a directory where the training images can be found (must contain * to expand and find multiple images) imagesize: the size to which the obtained images will be rescaled (imagesize*imagesize pixels)

returns:

images: a numpy array containing the image information and dimensions (number of images*imagesize*imagesize*1 )

class organic.organic.SPARCO(wave0=1.65e-06, fstar=0.6, dstar=-4.0, denv=0.0, UDstar=0.01, fsec=0.0, dsec=-4, xsec=0.0, ysec=0.0)#
